name: Project Merigold (Name not Final)
description:
PUBLISHER(S) READING THIS, PLEASE CONTACT ME FOR NEGOTIATIONS TO HELP WITH THE GAME.

this is a project i've been working on since january, its a Vertical Slice of a game i want to get Published and or get funds for.

the game in questions is a simple, stage based platformer where the gimmick is, is that you can't touch the ground and you haft to bounce on Coins to make it to the end of every level.

The game is very early, and the content in the build is meant to best represent what the game is, its core mechanics and the where the general meat of the game lies in.

CONTROLS: use the LEFT and RIGHT ARROW KEYS to move LEFT or RIGHT, PRESS AND HOLD SPACE during a Bounce to get more height,

when in Menu's(IE main menu, pause menu, etc) you can use the Arrow Keys to navigate between buttons, and pressing ENTER on a highlighted Button will press said Button
